misc: Doubles as a professional model as his side hustle
Few players dare to give him lip due to his intimidating presence and wrestling skills
biography: Olli, a formidable presence on the golf course, hails from the prestigious Helsingin Golfklubi. Beyond the greens, Olli is known to dabble in the world of professional modeling, showcasing a versatility that few can match.

With seven past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Olli is preparing for his eighth appearance at the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025. While the coveted Hector Trophée and the individual Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, his competitive spirit remains unbroken.

Known for his intimidating presence and rumored wrestling skills, few players dare to challenge Olli directly, making him a respected, if not feared, competitor in the field. His fellow competitors know better than to give him lip.
Olli remains an active and dedicated participant in the Hector Trophée events.
